title: Beijing 2022: Celebrate curling's Olympic return with GB's Bruce Mouat and Australia
description: Team GB curler Bruce Mouat opens up about how coming out as gay eight years ago helped his confidence. Plus, we hear from Australian mixed doubles pair Tahili Gill and Dean Hewitt on the difficulties they've faced just making it to the Olympic rink. The first day of Olympic action is starting at Beijing 2022. The Olympic Channel Podcast is going daily for the duration. Let's go!!!
